repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
The manuscript is a commentary on the Vyavahārakaṇḍa, second chapter of the Yājñavalkyasmṛti. It is a vyākhyā by the Vijñāneśvara.
Some text written in Grantha on the first two folios which is not clear.

msItem.title: Mitākṣarā of Vijñāneśvara (Vyavahārakaṇḍa)
msItem.author: Vijñāneśvara

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus Vol. 1, p. 454 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol. 20, p. 214.

msItem.finalRubric: iti śrīmatpadmanābhabhaṭṭopādhyāyātmajasya śrīmatparamahaṁsaparivrājaka… 2 … ṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyāṁ yājñavalkyadharmmaśāstravivṛtaudvitīyodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ |

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folios, one blank folio at the beginning, 200 written folios.

additions.desc: [Vya]vahārakaṇḍa is written in the left margin. The first letter is damaged due to broken edges. Before the title is written neśvaram, seems that the name of the author is mentioned but due to damage of the folio only part is legible.
bhyo namaḥ [ṇe]śāya namaḥ in the left margin. But due to broken side there is lacuna. [ṇe] is emended as it could be gaṇeśāya. on ṇaśāya namaḥ is legible.

On
the last folio of the manuscript a table of content is given mentioning the title of each section of the second chapter and number of verses of that sections. for exmple: sambhuyasamutthānam 7 steyam 17. The table is written in three columns.

On folio
1 iti śrīmatpadmanābhabhaṭṭopādhyāyātmajasya śrīmatparamahaṁsaparivrājaka… 2 … ṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyāṁ yājñavalkyadharmmaśāstravivṛtaudvitīyodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ |

listBibl.bibl: Yajnavalkya Smrti (with the Mitakshara Commentary, Subodhini and Balambhatta's Gloss) Edited by: S.S. Setlur, B.A. L.L.B. Brahmavadin Press, Georgetown, Madras (Chennai): 1912.

encodingDesc.p: dots are used to show lacuna.

TEI.text:
abhiṣekādiguṇayuktasya rājñaḥ prajāpālanaṁ …. tacca dṛṣṭanigrahamantareṇa na saṁbhavati duṣṭaparijñānañca na vyavahāradarśanena vine
|||||| grahaṇe pūrvasvāminaḥ svatvavicchedābāvāt | iti śrīmatpadmanābhabhaṭṭopādhyāyātmajasya śrīmatparamahaṁsaparivrājaka…
… ṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyāṁ yājñavalkyadharmmaśāstravivṛtaudvitīyodhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ | asminnadhyāye prakaraṇānukramaṇikā kathyate |||
|||| mātṛkāprakaraṇaṁ suktilakṣaṇaṁ ṛṇādānaṁ 4 niḥkṣepa 5 sākṣī lakṣaṇaṁ 6 lekhyaṁ 7 dīvya| 8 dāyavibhāgaḥ 9 sīmāvivādaḥ 10 svāmipā
lavivādaḥ 11 asvāmivikrayaḥ 12 dattāpradānikaṁ 13 krītvānuśayaḥ abhyupetyaśuśruṣā 14 saṁvidyatikramaH etanādānaṁ 16 dyuta |
māhvayā|ākpāruṣyam 18 daṇḍapāruṣyam 19 sahansam ikriyāsaṁpradānam 21 sambhūyasamuthānam 22 steaṁ 23 strīsaṁgrahaṇam 24 prakīr
kaṁ 25 idi pañcaviṁśatiprakaraṇāni uttamopadasyeyaṁ śiṣyasya kṛtirātmanaḥ dharmmaśāstrasya vivṛtirvijñāneśvarasurīṇaḥ
